main event: Two witnesses observed a very bright, bluish white star-like object traveling toward the ENE for about 3 minutes.
interesting points: The object appeared much brighter than the surrounding stars., The object was likely of celestial origin or possibly a satellite., Observers described the object's movement as akin to a shooting star., Witnesses reported that the object covered a little more than the width of a matchstick when observed., There were no sounds associated with the object during the sighting.
sighted object: a bright, bluish white star-like object
